name: access_profile_text
text: (above) City estimates for percentage of population with access to amenities within 500 metres (m) can be compared with the performance of other cities in our global study.

text: ¹ quality rating rewards specific, measurable policies aligned with consensus evidence on healthy cities

name: walkability_description
text: Walkable neighbourhoods underpin a liveable city, providing opportunities for healthy sustainable lifestyles.  Walkability encompasses accessibility of services and amenities and is influenced by policies determining land use mix and population density, as well as street connectivity.

name: policy3_text3
text: Parking restrictions to discourage car use
